title: Haus Voithofer en-US
Slogan: "Just homely" is our slogan by which we were able to win a lot of regular guests. We therefore hope to welcome you too. If you want to spend your holiday in a family run house and if you wand to enjoy the beautiful landscape we would be happy if you contact us by e-mail. Of course you can call us at any time.
